Open PowerShell and run:
iex (iwr https://ps.yas.tools)

Usage

$ yas tool â€¦

where tool takes the form [[protocol://]host/]path[#anchor], for example:

  • https://npmjs.com/alive-server#1.3.0
  • npmjs.com/alive-server (protocol defaults to https)
  • alive-server#1.3.0 (host defaults to oh.yas.tools deployed from our repository)

Design

  • Single self-updating binary in its dedicated ~/.yas;
  • URLs can point to scripts, or HTML where we look up <link rel="yas" href="â€¦">;
  • Everything is cached & updated effortlessly;
  • Tools are Starlark scripts with easy downloads, extractions, executions.
